icd3

Class HaabDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • icd3.CyclicDate<HaabDate>
      • icd3.HaabDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MayanDate<HaabDate>

    public class HaabDate
extends CyclicDate<HaabDate>
    An immutable data structure that represents the Haab method of Mayan calendaring.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HaabDate.Month
      The names and order of the months in the Haab system of Mayan calendaring.
